securityTitle.value: Common Stock, par value $0.001 per share ("Common Stock")

footnotes.footnote: This Form 4 details the Reporting Person's ownership of the Issuer's securities as of December 20, 2018.
These shares were acquired in connection with a pro rata distribution by an investment fund in which Mr. Farkas is a less than 5% equity owner.
Mr. Farkas has voting and investment power with respect to these shares.
Mr. Farkas has three minor children, each of whom owns 5,000 shares of Common Stock (a total of 15,000 shares), in which Mr. Farkas has voting and investment power and serves as custodian.
Mr. Farkas has voting and investment power as trustee with respect to these shares.
Mr. Farkas is a beneficiary of these shares.
